channel.title: Getting Started on RythmStick
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on RythmStick

item.title: Lighting the TikiTorch to bypass EDRs
item.description:
Intro A quick practical demonstration of running a 64 bit stageless meterpreter reverse shell using Rastamouse’s TikiTorch to bypass EDRs. Try to download it as a Windows binary and you’ll swiftly fall foul of Windows Defender. TikiTorch uses process hollowing techniques to hide the code in native Windows binaries. For a better/more detailed description see the Github Repo above.
Step 1 - Generate the Shellcode We’re using msfvenom in Kali 2018.
